Package Controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
Controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is a controller for the log in screen and provides all logic for sign in actions, error messages and local time zone.

    • loadDashboard

      public void loadDashboard(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException

      Throws:
      IOException

    • validateUser

      public Boolean validateUser() throws SQLException
      A method to verify if user enters the correct information. Gets text entered into the username and password field on the log in form. Uses a SQL prepared statement to match these strings against database. If there is a match, returns a true Boolean variable.
      Returns:
      userVerified boolean
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getCurrentUser

      A method to get the current logged in user and pass this user to other controllers.
      Returns:
      currentUser

    • getUserTimeZone

      public TimeZone getUserTimeZone()
      A getter for the users current Time Zone.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Upon initialization of the login screen calls the setLanguage method to set text to default locale language. Calls method to get users Time Zone and sets the text in the Time Zone box to that.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
